summary: Demons cross the divide between the world of dreams and waking reality to capture a victim and drag him back to their nightmarish realm.
cast: Igor Anikin|Alexandra Batrumova|Yukari Fujimoto|Svyatoslav Iliyasov|Andrey Iskanov|Alexander Kravchenko|Zoya Alexandrovna Makarova|Irina Nikitina|Igor Orlov|Alexander Shevchenko|Victor Silkin|Dmitriy Skripnik|Anna Subbotina
title: Visions of Suffering
